entry.title: Libre/Open blockchain / cryptographic ASICs
entry.summary: In a recent exchange, Luke Kenneth Casson Leighton raised concerns regarding the visibility of certain emails sent in February, questioning their presence on the ozlabs archives. The conversation was pointed towards an issue related to email dissemination or archival discrepancies. Bryan responded by directing attention to the threads for the bitcoin-dev mailing list for the month of February 2021, providing a link for reference ([bitcoin-dev mailing list February 2021 threads](https://lists.linuxfoundation.org/pipermail/bitcoin-dev/2021-February/thread.html)). Additionally, Bryan included his Twitter handle for further communication or follow-ups ([@kanzure](https://twitter.com/kanzure)). This interaction highlights a specific inquiry about email correspondence and the mechanisms of archiving such communications in professional and technical forums.
